amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $85,670,000 to enable the Secretary of Homeland Security to hire 800 additional full time active duty investigators to investigate immigration laws violations and to offset such increase on a pro rata basis.

action.text: Amendment SA 4660 proposed by Senator Sessions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4660 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 66. Record Vote Number: 201.
